short_summary: Procurement of CORD and ROPE Fibrous.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
### **Procurement of CORD and ROPE Fibrous Materials**

#### Tender Identification Number

* Reference Number: CB-8535-75395682
* Solicitation Number: W8485-247819
* Amendment Number: 13

#### Tender Notice Details
* Title: Request for Proposal (RFP) for CORD and ROPE Fibrous Materials
* Publication Date: August 28, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 20, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the procurement of CORD and ROPE fibrous materials.

The following items are covered in this procurement:

* Item 1: **ROPE, FIBROUS**
	+ UNSPSC: 31150500
	+ Description: ROPE, FIBROUS
	+ Quantity: 23 spools (115,000 ft)
* Item 2: **CORD, FIBROUS**
	+ UNSPSC: 31150500
	+ Description: CORD, FIBROUS
	+ Quantity: 300 spools (450,000 ft)

Bidders are required to submit a proposal that meets the requirements outlined in the tender documents. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Important Dates and Times

* Tender Closing Date: October 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 20, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

#### Contact Information
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:
Louis-Yves Tremblay
Telephone: 819-939-4271
Email: Louis-Yves.Tremblay@forces.gc.ca
Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2

#### Documents
The tender documents, including the RFP and specifications, can be obtained by:

* Visiting the Canada Buys website at [www.canadabuys.ca](http://www.canadabuys.ca)
* Using the Solicitation Number (W8485-247819) to search for the tender documents

Note: The tender documents are available in both English and French.
